patterns_discovered.component_structure: Consistent shadcn/ui component pattern with Dialog, DialogContent, DialogHeader structure
patterns_discovered.props_interface: Standard React component props with optional parameters and loading states
patterns_discovered.accessibility: Built-in accessibility support through shadcn/ui components
patterns_discovered.error_handling: No error handling patterns implemented in this session
patterns_discovered.state_management: Simple open/closed state managed by parent component

gotchas_discovered.missing_error_handling: No error handling for confirmation action
gotchas_discovered.performance: No memoization or optimization for re-renders
gotchas_discovered.type_safety: TypeScript interface good but could be more specific about required props

approach_outcome.success_criteria: Created clean, accessible confirmation dialog component
approach_outcome.implementation_quality: Good - follows React best practices and uses established UI library
approach_outcome.reusability: High - well-designed props interface allows for flexible usage
approach_outcome.maintainability: Good - clear structure and naming conventions

recommendations: Add error handling for the onConfirm callback
Implement prop validation for required props
Consider adding success feedback after cancellation
Add accessibility attributes for better screen reader support
Consider adding animation hooks for better UX
